import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Fullscreen,Sidebar,Circle,Imaherr,Picker} from './PizarronElements' import Pincel from '../Images/pincel.png' import Boardi from './Board' const BoardMain = () => { const[selectedColor, setSelectedColor] = useState("black") return (
setSelectedColor(e.target.value)} />
) } export default BoardMain
